title: Finish the Color Pattern!
description: 📡 Pattern failure! Elun Stink was too busy fighting with bots on Twitter to complete the transmission grid. Half the critical relay symbols are missing ❓ and astronauts can't call home 📞! Examine the example grids to see how blank spaces should be filled. Complete today's symbol grid with the correct patterns ✨ to restore communication for the stranded crew 👩‍🚀👨‍🚀!
hints: Think of the grid as being reflected in a mirror placed to the right side.
The first column becomes the last column, the second becomes the second-to-last, and so on.
The black square (⬛) reflects just like any other cell value.
